description.narrative:
The objective of FMO’s funds is to:
1. Support in the validation, demand creation and upscaling of the innovative Wiser Wash denim washing technique across the 9 laundries of PPJ in Vietnam; and
2. Support in improving the Wiser Wash business model for wider roll out in emerging markets with a focus on: a. Developing standards and an Environmental and Social Management System (ESMS) for Wiser Globe that are IFC E&S performance standards compliant b. Building the capacity of Wiser Globe in the assessment and compliance of Wiser Wash clients with a focus on PPJ as a pilot. c. Refining the Wiser Wash business plan for roll out in Vietnam and other emerging markets.
